trans-unit.source: Property constraint exception class.
trans-unit.target: 屬性條件約束例外狀況類別。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class has state - so if you change even its internals, it can be a breaking change.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個類別已縣/市-所以如果您變更即使其內部項目時，它可以是一項重大變更。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref> class with default message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref>類別預設的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref> class with supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref>類別所提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref> class with supplied message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref>類別提供的訊息和內部例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 內部的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.PropertyConstraintException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 內部的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>例外狀況的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The serialization context.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property that violated the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 取得違反條件約束的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that violated the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 違反條件約束的屬性名稱。
